_description: A song to celebrate the birth of Prince Henry in A.D. 1511 — four macaronic lines

BLAdd31922.Transcription: Adew adew le companyI trust we shall mete oftenerviue le katerine et viue le princele infant rosary
BLAdd31922.Note: Words and notation repeated twice for three singing voices.
